data.price: کە قورئانی فێری(موحەممەد ﷺ وئادەمیزاد کرد، بەئاسانکردنی خوێندنەوە و لەبەرکردن وتێگەیشتنی مانا وواتاکانی)

dua.name: Ayat al-Rahman
dua.significanceReason: Initiates the Surah of Mercy, profoundly emphasizing divine compassion, teaching, and the comprehensive nature of Allah's mercy.

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
